div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1143 Fantalovskaia, Taman' Peninsula, Krasnodar Territory, RSFSR, 1963 Burial: c. 80 B.C. Contents: 487+ AR. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: 337 didr. (as BMC 11) Gorgippia: 15 didr. (types of BMC Panti- capaeum 11) Phanagoria: 135 didr. (types of BMC Panticapaeum 11) Disposition: Anapa 485; Moscow (Pushkin) 2; private coll. 20-30 Salov, VDI 1965, no.2, pp. 101-2 â€ Golenko, VDI 1965, no. 4, pp. 141-58
